title.rendered: Compliant with NMC Gazette 2021, the only Destination for Medical Education

content.rendered:
UV Gullas College of Medicine Logo

only option for Indian students to study MBBS in Overseas is Philippines

PRC letter from Philippines make only country valid to study for Indian Students

Director of Admissions of UV Gullas College of Medicine Admissions Suba Ramesh

UV Gullas College of Medicine Graduation Day

“UV Gullas College of Medicine, Philippines: Fulfilling NMC Gazette 2021 Requirements, Offering Unparalleled Medical Education Opportunities”

UV Gullas College of Medicine, Philippines has emerged as a beacon of excellence in medical education, fully adhering to the requirements set forth by the NMC Gazette 2021,”

— Mrs. Suba “Director of Visayas Education”

CHENNAI, TAMIL NADU, INDIA, June 22, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — UV Gullas College of Medicine Recognized by the Philippines Government is now 100% Valid in INDIA and fulfils all the NMC criteria as per the New Affidavit announced by Professional Regulation Commission

UV Gullas College of Medicine, a leading medical institution in the Philippines, Cebu city is pleased to announce an Announcement by the Republic of Philippines PROFESSIONAL REGULATION COMMISSION through the issuance of a new affidavit. This acknowledgment further solidifies UV Gullas College of Medicine’s commitment to providing high-quality medical education and training is perfect and collides with all the criteria of NMC.

The new affidavit, issued by the esteemed Philippines PRC government, highlights the exceptional Regulations announced by NMC (National Medical Commission) of INDIA is now very much abided by UV Gullas College of Medicine in imparting medical education. The institution’s curriculum of 54 months, 1 Year of internship, and also now the License to Practice have been officially recognized, further emphasizing its prominence in the medical education landscape.

UV Gullas College of Medicine takes pride in its dedicated faculty members, who are highly qualified and experienced professionals in their respective fields. They employ innovative teaching methodologies to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel in the medical profession. This recognition by the Philippines government validates the institution’s unwavering commitment to academic excellence and sets it apart as a trusted institution for aspiring medical professionals.

The Dean of UV Gullas College of Medicine, expressed his gratitude for the Announcement received. “We are honored to be acknowledged by the PRC of Philippines government that Philippines would be the ONLY COUNTRY who have accepted and abided all the Clause of the gazette of NMC of INDIA through this new affidavit,” moreover “This recognition not only affirms our commitment to delivering exceptional medical education but also reinforces our dedication to producing competent and compassionate healthcare practitioners who can make a positive impact in the field.”

UV Gullas College of Medicine offers a comprehensive medical curriculum that focuses on holistic development, encompassing theoretical knowledge, practical skills, and professional ethics. The institution is known for its strong emphasis on clinical exposure, allowing students to gain invaluable hands-on experience in real medical settings. This recognition further strengthens the trust and confidence of students, parents, and the medical community in the institution’s ability to produce competent medical graduates.

About UV Gullas College of Medicine:

UV Gullas College of Medicine is a prestigious medical institution based in the Philippines. Established with a vision to produce competent and compassionate medical professionals, the college offers a comprehensive medical curriculum, state-of-the-art facilities, and a faculty comprising experienced professionals. With a strong focus on academic excellence and clinical exposure, UV Gullas College of Medicine prepares students to excel in their medical careers and make a positive impact in the healthcare industry.

Hostel and Food Facilities: Comfort and Convenience Combined

UV Gullas College of Medicine recognizes the importance of providing a supportive living environment for its students. The college offers well-maintained hostels with modern amenities, ensuring a comfortable and secure stay. With 24/7 security, Wi-Fi connectivity, study rooms, and recreational areas, the hostels at UV Gullas College of Medicine create a conducive atmosphere for learning and personal growth. Additionally, the college provides both North-Indian & South-Indian nutritious and diverse food options through its on-campus canteen, catering to the dietary preferences of Indian students.

Admissions Office: Your Gateway to UV Gullas College of Medicine

The UV Gullas College of Medicine Admissions Office welcomes Indian students seeking an enriching medical education experience. The admissions process is streamlined and hassle-free, ensuring a seamless journey for prospective candidates. To apply, visit the UV Gullas College of Medicine visit www.uvgullascollegeofmedicine.com or contact the dedicated admissions team, located in who will guide you through the process and address any questions you may have.

Conclusion:

When it comes to pursuing an MBBS degree, UV Gullas College of Medicine in the Philippines emerges as a top choice for Indian students. With its unwavering commitment to excellence in medical education, affordable fees structure, state-of-the-art facilities, and outstanding hostel and food facilities, UV Gullas College of Medicine provides an unparalleled opportunity to realize your medical dreams. Don’t miss the chance to apply for the upcoming academic year. Contact the UV Gullas College of Medicine Admissions Office or visit their website to kick-start your journey towards becoming an exceptional medical professional.

Suba Ramesh
EDUCATION ADVISORS FOR PHILIPPHINES
+91 94455 53877
email us here

Top Reasons to Choose UV Gullas College of Medicine, Cebu City, Philippines
